Skills

With no doubt, programming skills is very important in doing research. I compile and run codes in the Linux platform, and also can use Fortran, C/C++, however, MATLAB is the most frequently-used tool for me.

I have a superficial knowledge on IDL and Python, also, I am a novice on Git and Jekyll.

I can use AutoCAD proficiently, and can use ArcGis, ENVI, and SPSS finish certain fundamental operations.
